Plot: A troubled Native American veteran forms an extraordinary friendship with his maverick French psychoanalyst as they try to find a cure to his suffering.
Title: Jimmy P.
Writer: Sherman Alexie (verses from poem "Tribal Ceremony"), Arnaud Desplechin, Georges Devereux (based on "Reality and Dreams" by), Kent Jones, Julie Peyr
Actors: Benicio Del Toro, Michelle Thrush, Gary Farmer, Larry Pine
tomatoConsensus: Jimmy P. has interesting ideas and talented stars, but director Arnaud Desplechin can't seem to figure out how to bring them together.
